flawed_nl_solution:
After losing 57 legos, Nellie has 380 - 57 = <<380-57=332>>332 legos.
After giving her sister 24 legos Nellie has 332 - 24 = <<332-24=308>>308 legos
#### 308

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 323, not 332. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
